B1_Title: Prof. Dr. Khaled Gad's Speech , Deputy Director for The Extension & Training Sector of the Institute
B1: The primary role of the Agricultural Research Center
First: Development of new crop varieties.
Second: Production of breeder and foundation seeds.
Third: Issuing technical recommendations for various crops.

Fourth: Technology transfer, extension, and training. I believe this role is the most important, because without it, the other roles cannot succeed in fulfilling their mission. One of the institute’s key messages is introducing farmers to the latest high-quality, high-yielding, and climate-resilient varieties, as well as the latest technical recommendations to achieve maximum productivity, especially under changing climate conditions. This is achieved through various activities, including training extension staff in different governorates to convey information to farmers, and training young researchers at the institute on the latest scientific techniques, as well as languages, computer skills, and more.

Direction_Mission.title: الحملات القومية
Direction_Mission.subtitle: المحاصيل الاستراتيجية مثل : القمح – الذرة – الأرز
Direction_Mission.subtitleEn: Strategic Crops Like : Wheat - Corn - Rice includes:

Direction_Mission.title: القوافل الارشاديه
Direction_Mission.subtitle: تغطي المناطق النائيه والمحرومه من النشاط الارشادى وتشمل:
Direction_Mission.subtitleEn: Covers remote and underserved areas of extension activities and includes:

Direction_Mission.title: الحقول الارشاديه
items: عمل حقول ارشاديه للمحاصيل التى لا يوجد لها حملات قوميه لنشر الأصناف الجديدة وتدريب المزارعين علي الحصول علي أعلي انتاجيه ومجابهه التغييرات المناخيه
itemsEn: Establishing demonstration fields for crops that do not have national campaigns, in order to disseminate new varieties and train farmers on achieving the highest productivity and coping with climate change.

Direction_Mission.title: النشاط التدريبي للهيئه البحثيه والكوادر الشبابيه والجهاز الارشادى
Direction_Mission.titleEn: Training activities for the research body, young cadres, and the extension system
items: عمل دورات تدريبيه لشباب الباحثين حول أحدث التقنيات الزراعيه وكذلك تدريب شباب الباحثين علي أحدث البرامج الاحصائيه وتدريب شباب الباحثين في عدد من الكورسات الحاسب الألى واللغات
itemsEn: Conducting training courses for young researchers on the latest agricultural technologies, as well as training them on the latest statistical programs, computer courses, and languages.

Futuristic_Vision_Array.title: Enhancing the Role of Agricultural Extension as a Bridge Between Research and Application
details: Transforming research outputs into simplified extension messages accessible to farmers at all levels.
Using innovative communication methods such as digital platforms, mobile applications, explanatory videos, and demonstration fields.

Futuristic_Vision_Array.title: Developing the Agricultural Training System
details: Preparing specialized training programs targeting researchers, agricultural engineers, and farmers.
Focusing on practical field training that enables trainees to apply the latest agricultural technologies in real conditions.
Integrating traditional training with digital training (distance learning, interactive platforms).

Futuristic_Vision_Array.title: Investing in Building Human Capacity
details: Preparing research and extension cadres capable of leading change in the agricultural sector.
Providing training programs aligned with developments in smart agriculture, water management, and biotechnology.

Futuristic_Vision_Array.title: Expanding Local and International Partnerships and Cooperation
details: Strengthening cooperation with Egyptian, Arab, and international research centers and universities.
Benefiting from global expertise to develop extension and training programs that enhance human resource efficiency.

Futuristic_Vision_Array.title: Promoting a Culture of Sustainable Agricultural Development
details: Focusing on sound agricultural practices and efficient management of natural resources.
Supporting food security programs by training farmers in sustainable production methods.

Video_Gallery_Main_Title: A collection of videos on agricultural training and extension
Main_Title: The Future Vision of the Deputy Director of the Institute for Extension and Training
Sub_Title: The future vision for extension and training at the Field Crops Research Institute aims to build an integrated extension and training system based on the results of modern scientific research, keeping pace with the rapid technological development in the agricultural field. The vision is for the Institute to become a leading and distinguished platform in disseminating applied agricultural knowledge and building human capacities in line with the requirements of sustainable agricultural development, increasing productivity, and improving crop quality. The features of this vision are as follows:
